# oystehr_project (Data Source)

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `default_patient_role_id` (String) The default patient role ID for the project
- `description` (String) The project's description
- `fhir_version` (String) The FHIR version for the project.
- `id` (String) The project's unique identifier
